oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Meharry Medical College - Nashville, Tenn., circa 1943
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of Meharry Medical College located adjacent to the Fisk University campus on D.B. Todd Jr. Boulevard in Nashville, Tennessee. The school was first organized in 1876 as the largest professional college in the world for the training of African American youth in medicine, dentistry, pharmacy and nursing. New buildings were completed and dedicated in 1931. Forms part of the Norton Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Meharry Medical College
